CustomField.formula:
BLANKVALUE( Override_Countersign_Template_Id__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Contract_Type__c,"Generic"),
"[Terms and Conditions (Countersigned)]"&Product__r.Generic_Terms_Template_Countersigned__c,
IF( Generate_Disclosure_Form__c=true ,
"[Community Solar Agreement (Countersigned)]"&Product__r.Project_Specific_Template_Countersigned__c& IF(ISBLANK(Product__r.Disclosure_Form_Conga_Template__c),"",","&"[Solar Disclosure Form (Countersigned)]"&Product__r.Disclosure_Template_Countersigned__c) ,
"[Community Solar Agreement (Countersigned)]"&Product__r.Project_Specific_Template_Countersigned__c
) ))
CustomField.label: Conga Template ID (Countersigned)
